page.title: 05Halesworth Attitudes:
page.content: 285 people in Halesworth Middle School section were asked the following questions on 9/7/85. 1. Do you think Halesworth district is:BUSY;QUIET.SCRUFFY;TIDY.ATTRACTIVE; UGLY. 2. Do you think Halesworth District worst problem is:PARKING: HOUSING:TRAFFIC:UNEMPLOYMENT: LACK OF SHOPS 3. Which of the following do you think should be developed in Halesworth district.You may state more than one if you wish; INDUSTRY.TOURISM.HOUSING. ROADS.TRANSPORT. ANSWERS: 1.BUSY:252,QUIET:33,SCRUFFY:73,TIDY:112 ATTRACTIVE:231,UGLY:54. 2.PARKING:54,HOUSING:12,UNEMPLOYMENT 36,TRAFFIC:148,LACK OF SHOPS:23. 3.INDUSTRY:124,TOURISM:47,HOUSING:38, TRANSPORT:51,ROADS:139.
